md:
giải nghĩa từ "ornament" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Ornament (noun) : đồ trang trí, đồ mỹ nghệ

Example: The room was decorated with beautiful ornaments.

* Ornament (verb) : trang trí, tô điểm

Example: The designer ornamented the cake with intricate designs.

Related words: decoration, embellishment, adornment, accessory.

Note: Ornament can be used as both a noun and a verb. As a noun, it refers to a decorative item or object. As a verb, it means to add decorations or embellishments to something.
